hero.sidetext: I would appreciate a video conference to get to know each other and talk about your web development projects. Feel free to contact me to arrange a meeting. Thank you and see you soon!

experience.title: About me
experience.span1: I'm a full stack web developer passionate about technology and software development. I love working on challenging projects and creating innovative solutions to problems. My web development experience has made me an expert in creating responsive websites with a great user experience. In addition, I am very familiar with the most popular technologies as well as many other web development tools.
experience.span2: Throughout my career as a web developer, I've had the opportunity to work in different environments and projects, from small static sites to large web applications, always maintaining the same commitment and dedication in each of them.
experience.span3: My passion for web development drives me to stay up to date with the trends and technologies on the market, which allows me to always offer up-to-date and progressive solutions. If you are looking for a dedicated and passionate full stack web developer, don't hesitate to contact me! I look forward to working with you on your next projects and creating innovative and effective solutions together.

projects.title: My projects
projects.infohelphisTech: Development of a customer service dashboard to monitor and improve customer satisfaction. A user-friendly dashboard that provides real-time data and analytics to enable quick decision-making and enhance the customer experience.
projects.infoEvolution: Develop a user-friendly platform for trading cryptocurrencies and manage your investments with ease.
projects.infoUpTask: Develop a task management app with a user-friendly interface and features for managing tasks, deadlines, and notes. Increase your productivity and organize your life.
projects.infoBazar: Discover our agricultural trading platform based on blockchain technology. We offer you a transparent, secure, and efficient way to buy and sell agricultural products.
projects.infoTrami: Develop a platform for managing law firms where lawyers can view their assigned cases and pending clients, as well as contact information and other functions.
projects.infoEnvi: Our platform digitizes the entire process of supplier invoice management, from submission to payment, to increase efficiency and improve traceability.
